Class GameWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • GameWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class GameWindow
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    GameWindow is the GUI class for the game itself. Displays a grid as the lawn and current game status
    Version:
    May 25, 2018
    Author:
    Stanley Wang, Period: 5, Assignment: LMS, Sources: None
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
